channel.title: Overviews on How To Firebase: Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Overviews on How To Firebase: Tutorials

item.title: Overview
item.description: Overview Firebase is a huge suite of products. We’ll focus on web. Modules Some of these modules are much larger than others. Module Intensity Reasoning Authentication ðŸŒ¶ Auth is the easiest Firebase feature to implement. Storage ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶ Small API with some complexity Messaging ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶ The Firebase SDK hides most complexity Firestore ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶ Firestore is the meat of Firebase’s offering.

item.title: Dashboard
item.description: Firebase Dashboard Navigate to https://console.firebase.google.com/ This will be a whirlwind tour, so buckle up! Console landing page You’ll select an existing project or click “Add project” to create a new project.

item.title: Demo
item.description: Demo Install You can take this course without installing a local copy of the demo. You can always come back to this page later if you change your mind :) Check out the code The code can be found on the How To Firebase GitHub repo. Basic Git ahead... If you’re weak on Git, print out GitHub’s Cheatsheet Clone the project to your local filesystem with git clone https://github.
